title: Baroque Works Boss Identity Speculation
summary: Early theories about who could be the mysterious boss (Mr. 0) of Baroque Works that Vivi discovered, with various candidates proposed including powerful pirates or corrupt government officials.
fullText: Following the revelation that Vivi and Igaram infiltrated Baroque Works and discovered the boss's identity, fans immediately began speculating about who Mr. 0 could be. The fact that discovering this identity is dangerous enough to warrant assassination suggests someone powerful. Early theories ranged from a Warlord of the Sea to a corrupt World Government official plotting to take over Arabasta.
author: One Piece Fan Community (circa 2001)

source.title: Whisky Peak Arc - One Piece Wiki

title: Vivi's Role in the Straw Hat Crew
summary: Speculation about whether Princess Vivi would join the Straw Hat Pirates permanently after the revelation of her true identity and the threat to her kingdom.
fullText: With Vivi's true identity as a princess revealed and her kingdom under threat from Baroque Works, fans debated whether she would become an official member of the Straw Hat crew. Some argued her royal duties would prevent permanent membership, while others believed her bond with the crew would lead to her joining. The theory explored how a princess character would fit into the pirate crew dynamic.
author: One Piece Fan Community (early 2000s)

source.title: One Piece: What Happened To Vivi?

title: Sandai Kitetsu's Curse and Zoro's Fate
summary: Theories about whether Sandai Kitetsu's curse would eventually harm or kill Zoro, or if his willpower would break the curse pattern.
fullText: After Sandai Kitetsu demonstrated its ability to act independently in Episode 65, fans theorized about the sword's curse. All previous Kitetsu wielders died, but would Zoro's strength and determination allow him to break this pattern? Some fans believed the sword would eventually betray him in a critical moment, while others argued Zoro's will was strong enough to master the cursed blade. The theory gained traction after seeing the sword move on its own.
author: One Piece Sword Enthusiasts

title: Baroque Works' Scale and Grand Line Influence
summary: Speculation about how large and influential Baroque Works actually is, based on their presence at the Grand Line entrance and use of Devil Fruit users as agents.
fullText: The introduction of Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine as Officer Agents with Devil Fruit powers suggested Baroque Works was far more powerful than initially thought. Fans theorized about the organization's true scope: How many Officer Agents exist? If rank 5 agents have Devil Fruits, how powerful are the higher ranks? Does the organization control multiple islands? The revelation that the boss's identity alone is worth killing for suggested connections to major world powers.
author: One Piece World-Building Theorists
